General.Name: Yang Ming Marine Transport Corp
General.Description: Yang Ming Marine Transport Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides shipping, repair, and chartering services in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, Asia, and internationally. The company purchases and sells ships, containers, and chassis. It acts as a property, shipping, and forwarding and inland forwarding agent, as well as a shipping manager. In addition, it provides warehouse and terminal operations, as well as storage management, information system, insurance, cargo consolidation, container and trailer transportation, stevedoring, and logistics services. Yang Ming Marine Transport Corporation was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Keelung, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 271, Ming De 1st Road, Keelung, Taiwan, 20646
